about_the_game:
Craterbound is a space sandbox survival game set on a hostile alien planet. Explore an expansive and open world, upgrade your technology, and fight your way off the planet!

Explore a Strangely Beautiful Alien Planet


You work for the most frugal aerospace company out there, Craterbound Industries. Unfortunately for you, your mission has lived up to the company's name once again. You have crash-landed on the alien world of Brahe-5, filled with dangerous creatures and rolling hills.

Fight, Kill, Mine


On Brahe-5 it is kill or be killed. Luckily for you, your company has provided you with moderately adequate weapons. Your multitool can be used both to dissolve conquered enemies and take their resources.

Craft, Upgrade, Repair


You start out with just a basic shelter and tools. Your only means of escape is miles away, and your oxygen is limited. Use the resources you collect from the planet's wildlife to upgrade your suit, improve your tools, and repair your cruiser.

Deploy Shelters and Outposts


Brahe-5 is a big planet, and you will need shelter to survive the creature attacks and replenish your ever-diminishing oxygen supply. Construct habitats in order to fabricate upgrades, store resources, and fend off attacks.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (and newer) or SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (and newer) or SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Craterbound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750 or equivalent - Low Settings
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Craterbound is designed to run on a toaster.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 or equivalent - High to Epic Settings
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Though it looks prettier if you run it on something better.

short_description: Crash-land onto a unique and hostile alien world and begin your fight to survive. Face its inhabitants, upgrade your technology, create outposts & bases, and find a way to repair your ship. Explore the beautifully strange terrain, all while blasting and crafting your way off of the planet.
